fields.label: SDC
fields.description: SDC for which the parent SDI "softlink" reference is of

fields.label: Keyid 1
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 2
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 3
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Dataset
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Param
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Param Type
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Replicate
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Spec
fields.description: ID of the Spec for this sdispec.

fields.label: Spec Version
fields.description: Specific Version of the Spec for this sdispec.

fields.label: Limittype
fields.description: Named Range assigned by the specification upon determining in which limit range the 'checked' value is in.

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Condition assigned by the specification upon determining in which limit range the 'checked' value is in.

fields.label: Waived Flag
fields.description: <Not Used>

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Display Value
fields.description: Reformatted text according to the DisplayFormat rule.  It is the DisplayFormat that is typically shown on reports and screens.  This displayformat is used when different specifications have a different DisplayFormat then the underlying paramlistitem.

fields.label: Report Flag
fields.description: YN Flag to indicate that the specifciation indicated that this specific parameter is to be reported.  This is honored in the respective reporting definitions

fields.label: Transform Value
fields.description: Numeric Result after applying the spec's transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that then is copied to the sdidataitemspec.checkvalue for checking against the spec limits.

fields.label: Checked Value
fields.description: For numeric datatypes, this is the value that is checked against the specificaiton.  Note that this value is after the specparamitems.transformrule has been applied.

fields.label: Checkedtext
fields.description: For textual datatypes, this is the value that is checked against the specification

relations.label: Dataitem
relations.description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "DataItem".  The Dataitem defines a single result, observation or measurement and contains the actual value.
relations.relationship: [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[SDCID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[SDCID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID1] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID1] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID2] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID2] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID3] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID3] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMLISTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[VARIANTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[VARIANTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[DATASET] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[DATASET] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMTYPE] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMTYPE] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[REPLICATEID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[REPLICATEID]
relations.where: SDIDATAITEMSPEC.SDCID = SDIDATAITEM.SDCID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID1 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID1 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID2 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID2 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID3 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID3 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMLISTID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.VARIANTID = SDIDATAITEM.VARIANTID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.DATASET = SDIDATAITEM.DATASET AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMTYPE = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMTYPE AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.REPLICATEID = SDIDATAITEM.REPLICATEID

relations.label: specification
relations.description: Definition of a set of limits and rules that are used to evaluate the quality of data that is entered on a SDI

relations.label: Limit Type
relations.description: Enumeration of named limit classifications for Parameter Limits like Detection, or Absurdity Limits.  Also used to enumerate the limit classification of different limit ranges for Specification Limits

description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "DataItem".  The Dataitem defines a single result, observation or measurement and contains the actual value.

fields.label: SDC
fields.description: SDC for which the parent SDI "softlink" reference is of

fields.label: Keyid 1
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 2
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 3
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Dataset
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Param
fields.description: Name of the result

fields.label: Param Type
fields.description: Type of the result.  Typical types may be Standard [default], Average, RPD, etc.

fields.label: Replicate
fields.description: Invidual number of the result.  Used to distingquish between the multiple results when using mulitple replciates.  Starts with 1.

fields.label: Alias
fields.description: Alternate name for this parameter

fields.label: Mandatory Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating if this result must be filled in for the sdidata Dataset status to advance to 'DataEntered'

fields.label: Datatypes
fields.description: Different types of results for this parameter.  Code value N-Numeric, T-Text, NC-Numeric with Calculation, D-DateTime, O-DateOnly, R-ReferenceType, V-ValidatedReferenceType, S-SDCReference

fields.label: Entered Value
fields.description: Parsed numeric portion of the EnteredText value

fields.label: Enteredtext
fields.description: Text entered value as typed in by the analyst or grabbed from the instrument for this result.

fields.label: Entered Units
fields.description: Parsed unit that was entered with the EnteredText value

fields.label: Operator Rule
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Transform Value
fields.description: Numeric Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transform Date
fields.description: Date Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transformtext
fields.description: Text Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transform Rule
fields.description: Calculation expression to "transform" a value for a result to a differnet value to be used for calculation input and to apply limits against.  See sdidataitem.transformvalue.

fields.label: Display Value
fields.description: Reformatted text according to the DisplayFormat rule.  It is the DisplayFormat that is typically shown on reports and screens

fields.label: Display Units
fields.description: Unit of Measure for the result

fields.label: Displayformat
fields.description: Display Format rule used to generate a result's displayValue

fields.label: Rangeoperator
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Enteredqualifier
fields.description: Parsed <> qualifier that was entered with the EnteredText value

fields.label: Entry SDC
fields.description: For DataType of S, this indicates which SDC

fields.label: Entryreftype
fields.description: For Datatypes of V or R, this indicates which ReferenceType

fields.label: Calc Rule
fields.description: Expression detailing how this result is to be calculated.  Expressoins may use either the LabVantage syntax or Groovy

fields.label: Measurementaction
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Released Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result has been acknowledged.  After which the result is protected from changes.

fields.label: Value Status
fields.description: Code indicating the types of error on entry for a dataitem.  Null indicates no error.  Possible errors are  INVALID_SDI, INVALID_DATE_FORMAT, NON_NUMERIC, INVALID_UNITS.  [This is not an exhaustive list]

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Condition for this result.

fields.label: Transformdefer Flag
fields.description: YN Flag, but should actually be labeled as "transformignoreflag" because setting this flag will bypass the transformationrules.

fields.label: Textcolor
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Acoverridden Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the certificatino requirement for this dataset has been overriden when the result was entered

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Analyst
fields.description: User ID responsible for performing Data Entry on this result

fields.label: Qceval Status
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result caused an AQC QCBatch evaluation violation

fields.label: Displayvalueformat
fields.description: NEED TO TALK TO CHEN

fields.label: Calcexclude Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result should be excluded from subsequent calculations to indicate that it is an outlier

fields.label: Sdidataitem
fields.description: Internally assigned assession number as an alternate key to this record

fields.label: Instrument
fields.description: Instrument which was used to capture this result

fields.label: Instrumentfield
fields.description: Logical field coming from an instrument for  taking data directly from syncronous "simple" instruments.

relations.label: Dataset
relations.description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "Dataset". The Dataset defines a group of results, observations or measurements for a single step of a test.  The Step may be a single operation conducted by an analyst during data entry like Pre
relations.relationship: [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[SDCID] = [SDIDATA].[SDCID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID1] = [SDIDATA].[KEYID1] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID2] = [SDIDATA].[KEYID2] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID3] = [SDIDATA].[KEYID3] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTID] = [SDIDATA].[PARAMLISTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] = [SDIDATA].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[VARIANTID] = [SDIDATA].[VARIANTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[DATASET] = [SDIDATA].[DATASET]
relations.where: SDIDATAITEM.SDCID = SDIDATA.SDCID AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID1 = SDIDATA.KEYID1 AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID2 = SDIDATA.KEYID2 AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID3 = SDIDATA.KEYID3 AND SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTID = SDIDATA.PARAMLISTID AND SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = SDIDATA.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SDIDATAITEM.VARIANTID = SDIDATA.VARIANTID AND SDIDATAITEM.DATASET = SDIDATA.DATASET

relations.label: parameter
relations.description: Enumeration of the different parameters that can be defined in parameterlists and results(sdidataitems)
